scripts.release:frontend: cd frontend  && npm run build && cd ../frontend-portal && npm run build && fis3 release frontendDev -f ../fis-conf.js
scripts.release:backend: cd backend  && npm run build && cd ../backend-portal && npm run build && fis3 release backendDev -f ../fis-conf.js
scripts.release:all: npm run release:backend && npm run release:frontend
scripts.release:frontend:qa: cd frontend  && npm run build:test && cd ../frontend-portal && npm run build:test && fis3 release frontendTest -f ../fis-conf.js
scripts.release:backend:qa: cd backend  && npm run build:test && cd ../backend-portal && npm run build:test && fis3 release backendTest -f ../fis-conf.js
scripts.release:all:qa: npm run release:backend:qa && npm run release:frontend:qa
scripts.build:frontend:custom: cd frontend  && cd ../frontend-portal && npm run build:custom && fis3 release frontendCustom -f ../fis-conf.js -d ./dist
scripts.build:backend:custom: cd backend  && cd ../backend-portal && npm run build:custom && fis3 release backendCustom -f ../fis-conf.js -d ./dist
scripts.build:all:custom: npm run build:backend:custom && npm run build:frontend:custom
